UI.Title: L5R4 World Migrator
UI.Heading: World Migration Tool
UI.ReadyToExport: Ready to export data from legacy l5r4 system
UI.ReadyToImport: Ready to import data into l5r4-enhanced system
UI.UnsupportedSystem: This tool requires l5r4 or l5r4-enhanced system
UI.InfoText: This tool helps you safely migrate world data between l5r4 systems. Always create a backup before proceeding with any migration operations.
UI.BackupDescription: Create a timestamped backup of the current world before any migration operations.
UI.ExportDescription: Export all actors, items, scenes, and journal entries to a migration file.
UI.ValidateDescription: Check imported data for errors and compatibility issues before applying.
UI.ImportDescription: Import validated data into the current world. This will create new documents.

BackupLocation.Name: Backup Location
BackupLocation.Hint: Directory path where world backups will be stored

AutoBackup.Name: Automatic Backup
AutoBackup.Hint: Automatically create a backup before migration operations

LogLevel.Name: Log Level
LogLevel.Hint: Verbosity of console logging for migration operations
